# Notice
This is a stripped down version of the [STM32CubeF4 MCU Firmware Package](https://github.com/STMicroelectronics/STM32CubeF4) to minimize the cloning size of this repository. This is an external project and all files (except of this notice) in this directory are licensed as per `LICENSE.md`. Directory structure has been preserved to keep a possibility of using the original repository as a drop-in replacement of this copy.
